title: mihir
author: mihir
content: I find this platform and decide create their Private saleI make It and send 0.1 Eth for their services. After some days my Private sales they are being removedSupport name by Niall who's trying fix their problem tokenomics calculating on Gamepad but his nothing fixed and my presale  have removed in resultafter awhile I come back on the gamepad and ask support to recovery my private sale because i spend 0.1 ethy for this and get nothingThey told me that i must payed again 0.1 eth for this and they compensate to me my last private sales creating - given GOLD tier and Audit service for FreeI was agreeIn result i am waiting for two weeks and get nothing They Little scammers again ask me make payment for Audit service and Gold tier 0.2 ethBlocking me in they TG Channel and refuse refund my fundsMore over i am strongly not recommended creating your Private sales because you will not get any users to your project, this platform is empty. There is nobody there. Your just spend your ETH or BTC or BNB in the sky which you can spend it on marketing"They told me -What seems to be the problem here?Chill it with the attitude, Niall 100% didn't do anything wrong here."Yes they just Liars and  little scammers which does luring you money outToday i ask refund my ETH and they refuse make it want more 0.1 ETH for relisting their scammers platform. They want constantly more more more payments

comments.author: riantolie
comments.body: Well, I don't think that you can find a non-scammer on Telegram related to crypto. Especially if he asks you to send crypto. If you're sending someone crypto because they told you that in the DM, then you're simply making a donation.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Or you just recommend a company/user who wants to use launchpad.Only used a launchpad has been tested for their credibility, these launchpad are unknown launchpads (that's why the chance getting scam is high). But, I believe why you choosing such a random launchpad.Because probaly you are connot passed some document requitment on top tier launchpad due is really strict.
